channel.title: HELP with private server
channel.description: ok i just downloaded mopar scape and ive got hybridscape i want to make my server better but the only have guards in falador as ncp's and i cant open certain doors or do anything really, can som1 tell me what to do, i dont care about the no-ip thing ty for any1 that helps

item.title: HELP with private server
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

umm every single thing that you want done you have to code, for example, code the npcs by adding them to autospawn.cfg and fixing hp levels in npc.cfg, and as for doors, you have to add reactions to objects, which isnt hard, but IS time consuming, i suggest you either become willing to learn java, or take the easy way and download a source:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

Read full topic
